article_title: Do We Need Another Independent Regulatory Agency?

article_metadata.description: Beginning in 2014, the IPAB will work independently of any congressional oversight to ensure that Medicare spending meets certain spending targets; and Medicare spends more than $450 billion a year.
article_metadata.author: Walker Ray, MD and Tim Norbeck

og.description: Beginning in 2014, the IPAB will work independently of any congressional oversight to ensure that Medicare spending meets certain spending targets; and Medicare spends more than $450 billion a year.
og.title: A Close Look At IPAB: Do We Need Another Independent Regulatory Agency?
